duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle mail and maintain records for the Section of Pediatric Neonatology, Department of Pediatrics.
Assist with fellowship interviews and processing New Innovations system tasks.
Provide general administrative support as assigned under the direction of the section coordinator.

education_certification.credential: Enrollment in a graduate level course for each semester and maintaining registration through the end of the term.
Knowledge of complex accreditation standards and requirements preferred.
Ability to communicate ideas effectively both verbally and in writing.
